column4: Some finger print readers aren't well supported by Linux. Fedora has the best support for them I believe
ohh now i have to install fedora?? :O plz can u help out in ubuntu only?
You don't have to install Fedora, though if you're having hardware problems with Ubuntu, it's always worth trying a different distro. Fedora is very bleeding edge, so can have good support sometimes.
